SizeAnimation.OnPlay: local pinScale = animatingControl.pin:GetScale() local width, height = animatingControl:GetParent():GetDimensions() self:SetStartAndEndWidth(32 * pinScale, width + 36) self:SetStartAndEndHeight(32 * pinScale, height)

TranslateAnimation.OnPlay:
local parent = animatingControl:GetParent() local offsetX = animatingControl.pin:GetCenter() - parent:GetCenter() animatingControl:SetAnchor(CENTER, parent, CENTER, offsetX, 0)
self:SetTranslateDeltas(-offsetX, 0)

Control.name: ZO_CompassAreaTexture
Control.OnInitialized: self.left = self:GetNamedChild("Left") self.right = self:GetNamedChild("Right") self.center = self:GetNamedChild("Center")
